body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Anderson Automotive. My name is Dennis Anderson. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Gloria. Can I please have your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero eight dash two seven dash nineteen ninety three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Gloria. One more piece of information I need is your phone number, starting with the area code.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My phone number is five five five dash three zero nine dash two two five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Gloria. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I'm feeling excited about resolving this billing issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Gloria. Thank you for your time and patience. We will work on the issue and get back to you soon. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you! You too, have a great day.
